unsubSource.description: The source from which the email unsubscribe request originated.

createdAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the email unsubscribe data was created.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign associated with the email unsubscribe data.

documentCreatedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the document was created within Iterable.

documentUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the document was last updated within Iterable.

emailListId.description: The unique identifier for the email list associated with the email unsubscribe data.

emailListIds.description: The list of unique identifiers for multiple email lists associated with the email unsubscribe data.

workflowId.description: The unique identifier for the workflow associated with the email unsubscribe data.

messageId.description: The unique identifier for the message associated with the email unsubscribe data.

templateId.description: The unique identifier for the template associated with the email unsubscribe data.

channelIds.description: The list of unique identifiers for multiple channels associated with the email unsubscribe data.

email.description: The email address for which the user unsubscribed.

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user who unsubscribed from the email list.

channelId.description: The unique identifier for the channel associated with the email unsubscribe data.
